name: div
features: Superior Grip: Multi-directional texture for enhanced control
Durable & Lightweight: New formulation improves feel and longevity
Weather-Resistant: Slip-resistant in both wet and dry conditions
Shock Absorbing: Reduces vibration for a smoother swing
Easy Installation: Pre-cut ends with premium adhesive backing
Universal Fit: Works on wood, aluminum, and composite bats
Pro-Level Performance: Used and endorsed by professional players
Easy Maintenance: Cleans easily with water or isopropyl alcohol
